title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repo: a lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally on macOS, Linux, and Windows with a single CLI.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama—chat, embed, pull, and manage local models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration letting you swap in any Ollama model as an LLM or chat provider.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama—chat history, multi-model conversations, PDF uploads, RAG, user auth.

title: chainlit-ollama-starter
summary: Starter repo showing how to build a Chat-GPT-like app with Chainlit UI and Ollama backend.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Retrieval-Augmented-Generation pipeline using Ollama embeddings + llama-index.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Unofficial interactive CLI that wraps ollama-js for chatting, pulling, and listing models from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS-Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images (CPU & GPU) with one-line run commands.

title: llamafile → ollama importer
summary: Mozilla’s llamafile now exports binaries that can be imported and served by Ollama.

title: haystack-ollama
summary: Deepset Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes.

title: ollama-huggingface-hub
summary: Hugging Face Space that lets you browse and one-click download GGUF models into Ollama.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Lightweight Discord.py bot that streams Ollama answers into any Discord server.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module that injects an Ollama service with full TypeScript typings.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir wrapper that adds Ollama as a backend for LangChainEx and Axon LLM interfaces.

title: ollama-gpt4all-bridge
summary: GPT4All UI can now discover and chat with any Ollama model via local API bridge.

title: r/ollama – weekly model threads
summary: Active subreddit where users share new GGUF conversions, benchmarks, and tool integrations.
